snippet: PayPal, the electronic payments provider, said it had acquired Card.io, a start-up that offers a way for cellphones to capture credit card information by taking a picture of the card.
abstract: PayPal, the electronic payments provider, said it had acquired Card.io, a start-up that offers a way for cellphones to capture credit card information by taking a picture of the card.

headline.main: PayPal Snatches Up Another Mobile Payments Start-Up
